attributes.action: Free Naturalisation for immigrants meeting criteria
attributes.background: I was born Polish. I arrived in UK in 2007. Since I worked 2 jobs, contributing to the system. I am fearful for my future in England, as I am not planning on leaving. I would like HM Government to consider free citizenship for those who meet the criteria as a sign of support and reassurance.

rejection.details: It's not clear what criteria would need to be met to entitle people to free citizenship.
